info.name: USER-ROLE-MANAGEMENT
info.description: A simple API documentation for User Role Permission syatem.

response.name: Sign Up

request.description: User can login to give valid information.
Create new role to assign permission.
Show all role also assigning permission.
Give a list by passing role id.
Update role aslo assigining permission aslo.
Delete a role by given role id.

response.name: Role Delete
